remarks: Comparison of the limits of two infinite series.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 12-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2014.)
statement:
clim2ser.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
iserle.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
iserle.4 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> A ) $.
iserle.5 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , G ) ~~> B ) $.
iserle.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
iserle.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. RR ) $.
iserle.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) <_ ( G ` k ) ) $.
iserle $p |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
